title: (x) Wynn Las Vegas logo humanist sans - Gill Sans {Patricia}
content:
Love the sophistication of this font; thanks in advance for the ID guys!

[http://www.wynnlasvegas.com/img/logo\_index.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20080629055600/http:/www.wynnlasvegas.com/img/logo_index.gif "http://www.wynnlasvegas.com/img/logo\_index.gif")

 [‹ (x) "Made in California" rounded sans - custom (similar to Magda Clean) {Yves (Stephen)}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080629055600/http:/typophile.com/node/19461 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Wedding invite elegant script - Bickham Script {David Bailey} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080629055600/http:/typophile.com/node/19457 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Ken6800

comments.content:
Looks like Gill Sans to me.

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/gill-sans/gill-sans/testdrive.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20080629055600/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/gill-sans/gill-sans/testdrive.html "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/gill-sans/gill-sans/testdrive.html")

So it is, although they have changed the spacing.

Thanks very much.
